text:
M. S. NOVIK
500 WEST 23rd STREET • SUITE 1200 ♦ NEW YORK 11, N. Y. • ALGONQUIN 5-4385
RADIO
CONSULTANT
March 16, 1956
Dear Harry:
I guess you know the Chicago
Federation of Labor contributed $5000
to WTTW.
Remember how long it took to get
Bill Lee, President of the Federation
and Chairman of the Civil Service Commission
in Chicago, appointed to the Board?
But all's well that ends well!
Sincerely,
v_\C
M.S. Novik
Mr. Harry Skornia
NAEB
119 Gregory Hall
University Of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
